author: .vbuterin
content: I guess one reason I was being quiet on that is that I don't want to throw even more extra work on the devs when 4844 is ballooning into a megaproject that includes a halfway-transition to SSZ

content: As if it's EOF-specific, then the gains in protocol simplification and adding invariants don't really come to pass
